title: [bug] Panic in tauri-runtime-wry 0.14.3 during init on wayland

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

On wayland starting the app crashes with following:
```
thread 'main' panicked at /run/build/TrguiNG/cargo/vendor/tauri-runtime-wry-0.14.3/src/lib.rs:2021:55: called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: Unknown { .. } - "Unknown error while interacting with the clipboard: Display parsing error"
```

This is caused by switching to arboard in 0d0501cb7b5e767c51a3697a148acfe84211a7ad

To work properly on wayland it needs "wayland-data-control" feature enabled.

See similar issues in other apps: 
https://github.com/1Password/arboard/issues/98
https://github.com/YaLTeR/wl-clipboard-rs/issues/32


### Reproduction

Attempt to run a demo app under wayland. Possibly only reproducible in flatpak environment or when xwayland is not available.

The error above is from this app: https://flathub.org/apps/org.openscopeproject.TrguiNG

### Expected behavior

App starts without crash

### Full `tauri info` output

```text
[✔] Environment
    - OS: Debian 12 X64
    ✔ webkit2gtk-4.0: 2.42.4
    ✔ rsvg2: 2.54.7
    ✔ rustc: 1.74.0 (79e9716c9 2023-11-13)
    ✔ cargo: 1.74.0 (ecb9851af 2023-10-18)
    ✔ rustup: 1.26.0 (5af9b9484 2023-04-05)
    ✔ Rust toolchain: stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu (default)
    - node: 20.10.0
    - npm: 10.2.3
 
[-] Packages
    - tauri [RUST]: 1.5.4
    - tauri-build [RUST]: 1.5.1
    - wry [RUST]: 0.24.7
    - tao [RUST]: 0.16.5
    - @tauri-apps/api [NPM]: 1.5.3
    - @tauri-apps/cli [NPM]: 1.5.9
 
[-] App
    - build-type: bundle
    - CSP: unset
    - distDir: ../dist
    - devPath: http://localhost:8080/
    - framework: React
    - bundler: Webpack
```


### Stack trace

_No response_
